sentences.en: But relations between America and Britain in Afghanistan have been tetchy.
sentences.cn: 但美英在阿富汗的关系说变就变.

sentences.en: He was in a particularly tetchy mood yesterday.
Jane’s a bit tetchy this morning.
She can be a bit tetchy but her bark is worse than her bite.
sentences.cn: 她脾气可能有点暴躁，但她是刀子嘴，豆腐心。

sentences.en: There's no need to be so tetchy ( with me )!
sentences.cn: 何必 ( 跟我 ) 那麽着急!

sentences.en: There's no need to be so tetchy!
You always get tetchy when you're hungry.
sentences.cn: 你一饿的时候火气就大。

words.tran_cn: 易怒的，不和悦的；暴躁的

trans.tran_en: likely to get angry or upset easily
